title: Welcome to the Fifth Edition of
The Justia Insider
message: Welcome to another edition of the Justia Insider! Brrr, autumn is here, and it never comes alone… plenty of Halloween fun is around the Justia family this month! The company has steadily moved forward into the final quarter of 2020. We highly encourage everyone to participate in the Halloween costume and Pumpkin carving contests. Show us what you’ve got for this Halloween! Horribly awesome prizes are waiting for you all!
